Class DefaultFailQueueStrategy

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.worker.DefaultFailQueueStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FailQueueStrategy
public class DefaultFailQueueStrategy extends Object implements FailQueueStrategy
DefaultFailQueueStrategy puts all jobs in the standard Redis failure queue and imposes no limits on the max number of failed items to keep.

  • Method Details

    • getFailQueueKey

      public String getFailQueueKey(Throwable thrwbl, Job job, String curQueue)
      Determine the key for the failure queue. A null return value is an indication that no failure queue is needed. Note that the default implementation (@see DefaultFailQueueStrategy) will never return null.
      Specified by:
      getFailQueueKey in interface FailQueueStrategy
      Parameters:
      thrwbl - the Throwable that occurred
      job - the Job that failed
      curQueue - the queue the Job came from
      Returns:
      the key of the failure queue to put the job into or null

    • getFailQueueMaxItems

      public int getFailQueueMaxItems(String curQueue)
      Determine the max number of items to keep in the failure queue. Returning a value less than 1 means that there is no limit.
      Specified by:
      getFailQueueMaxItems in interface FailQueueStrategy
      Parameters:
      curQueue - the queue the Job came from
      Returns:
      the max number of items to keep for the failure queue
